data.text:
@W1nston984 @pfizer hello world!
Russia will disintegrate, split into many smaller countries after the war with Ukraine.

https://t.co/XvUj6HTWjb
love ukraine
@W1nston984 @pfizer The report is actually over a year old and it was peer reviewed. You conclusions are not true.
@CrunchoSR @W1nston984 @pfizer Ah. So it was the report I read last night.

@W1nston984 @pfizer And I can same the same about you. There are reasons I will only support information from credited sources. The internet has made it so that anyone can post bullshit and if people believe it. The internet has also made it so that people do not engage in critical thinking.

@LesterPolyster @pfizer This is what makes today impossible. The lefts echo chamber is so solidified that they only accept news from sources that are demonstrsbly lying to them - all else is tossed aside.

@LesterPolyster @W1nston984 @pfizer I’m pro vaccine, b it this is an actual report by Pfizer, tho only thing people don’t understand is that the report is from Feb 2021, and are just things that are needed to have been checked, correlation≠causation
@W1nston984 @pfizer Yes. It's fake. Send me the report from a reliable source

@W1nston984 @KimLev8 @ConfuseSaged @tim_shane @pfizer @W1nston984 you're comparing illegal medical experiments under the false guise of vaccinations to actual vaccinations? Do you always purposefully post misinformation and outright lies to try and make your points?

@bubbaquads @KimLev8 @ConfuseSaged @tim_shane @pfizer It’s also worth noting no prior vaccines included mRNA technologies, nor mRNA which concerted to DNA in the liver. Even if vaccines were historically flawless (which they weren’t) it would be preposterous to use that as a safety assumption for the new versions. https://t.co/0KpmogTwgv

@bubbaquads @KimLev8 @ConfuseSaged @tim_shane @pfizer Oh reallllly? Might want to read into the history around blacks and their vaccine hesitancy. This is the most arrogantly made moronic statement I’ve seen today.
